title: Meet a Scientologist— When Geoff Serra Found Scientology, He Also Found Himself (Church of Scientology ...
text: ( Source : Church of Scientology International ) Geoff Serra is an easygoing bloke from the Land Down Under who shares his perspective on achieving the state of Clear and his experience in Scientology . You probably wouldn't know it to meet
